original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: "British Ambassador to the US encourages Ukrainian President Zelensky to show flexibility in peace negotiations with Russia, suggesting that Western security guarantees could help him overcome domestic opposition. The specifics of the guarantees remain unclear, as the US has ruled out full NATO membership, and Russia has demanded an end to Western weapons supply to Ukraine."</s>
